titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Lebanon, Kentucky photographs, circa 1860s-1920s 2021av020
titlestmt.author: Sarah Welp

publicationstmt.publisher: University of Kentucky Special Collections Research Center

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2022-06-14 12:51:35 -0400.

repository.corpname: University of Kentucky Special Collections Research Center

did.abstract: The Lebanon, Kentucky photographs (dated circa 1860s-1920s; 0.09 cubic feet; 1 box) consists of four tintypes, one carte de visite, and four silver gelatin prints taken in and depicting Lebanon, Kentucky.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Collection is open to researchers by appointment.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: 2021av020: [identification of item], Lebanon, Kentucky photographs, circa 1860s-1920s, University of Kentucky Special Collections and Resource Center

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The Lebanon, Kentucky photographs (dated circa 1860s-1920s; 0.09 cubic feet; 1 box) consists of four tintypes, one carte de visite, and four silver gelatin prints taken in and depicting Lebanon, Kentucky. The carte de visite was produced at Miller photographic studio in Lebanon, Kentucky and appears to be a Native American man. Subjects include a school, firefighters in front of station, and the home of May Kirk, all in Lebanon, Kentucky.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: The physical rights to the materials in this collection are held by the University of Kentucky Special Collections Research Center.

did.unittitle: Five unidentified men with a bicycle presumably in Lebanon, Kentucky, tintype

Three well-dressed women in hats with backs to the camera, presumably in Lebanon, Kentucky, tintype
One unidentified woman standing in window with curtain, likely a studio backdrop, presumably in Lebanon, Kentucky, tintype
Unidentified man, possibly of Native American descent, photographer Miller in Lebanon, Kentucky, cabinet card
Lebanon public school class photograph, photographed by Gray & Miller in Lebanon, Kentucky.

Carl Litsey #13. 4th Row - John R. thomas #1, Alice Miller #6, Prof. P. Henry #7.
